typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{ MeterSerialNo} as string,
		{ Material} as string,
		{ Manufacturer} as string,
		{ MeterType} as string,
		YearOfManufacture as string,
		YearOfCertification as string,
		MonthOfManufacture as string,
		CreationDate as timestamp 'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm',
		ModernType as string,
		IMSI as string,
		IMEI as string,
		ICCID as string,
		FirmwareVer as string,
		ConfigurationVer as string,
		Status as string,
		Seed as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OnPremFileDataProcess
